burgers.name: Zinger Burger
burgers.description: Crispy golden-fried chicken fillet layered with spicy mayo, crunchy lettuce, and toasted sesame buns — a fiery, satisfying crunch in every bite.

burgers.name: Cheese Burger
burgers.description: Juicy grilled beef patty smothered in double layers of melted cheddar and mozzarella, drizzled with secret house sauce, served on a soft brioche bun.

burgers.name: Tandoori Burger
burgers.description: Flame-grilled chicken marinated in bold tandoori spices, topped with mint chutney, fresh onions, and lettuce for a flavorful Indian twist.

burgers.name: Nashville Burger
burgers.description: Extra-spicy Nashville-style fried chicken bursting with bold flavor, cooled with creamy slaw and pickles on a lightly toasted bun.

burgers.name: BBQ Burger
burgers.description: Smoky and savory beef patty glazed with rich BBQ sauce, stacked with crispy bacon, cheddar, grilled onions, and crunchy pickles.

burgers.name: Western Whopper
burgers.description: A hearty stack of grilled beef, crispy onion rings, American cheese, BBQ drizzle, and tangy mayo in a toasted sesame bun — cowboy approved.

burgers.name: Beef Burger
burgers.description: Premium seasoned beef patty paired with rich cheddar cheese, house-made sauce, fresh lettuce, and tomato — a true meat lover’s delight.

burgers.name: Mushroom Burger
burgers.description: Savory beef patty layered with sautéed mushrooms, creamy Swiss cheese, and caramelized onions — the ultimate umami bomb.

burgers.name: Veggie Burger
burgers.description: A colorful medley of garden-fresh veggies blended into a grilled patty, topped with lettuce, tomato, and house-made mayo for a wholesome crunch.

burgers.name: Spicy Veggie Burger
burgers.description: Bold spiced veggie patty with jalapeños, spicy aioli, and crunchy slaw, sandwiched in a toasted bun for a hot and hearty veggie fix.

burgers.name: Garden Fresh Burger
burgers.description: Loaded with avocado slices, fresh cucumber, juicy tomato, and crisp lettuce, this burger brings the garden straight to your plate.

burgers.name: Cheesy Veg Burger
burgers.description: A gooey mix of mozzarella, cheddar, and cream cheese melts over a grilled veggie patty — the ultimate cheesy vegetarian indulgence.
